text: it's thought a new world record for the
biggest wave surfed was set on Sunday by
a plumber from the UK 34 year old Andrew
cotton rode the 25 meter high wave there
he is
in there you could just see the wake
behind him off the coast of San Azhar in
Portugal he said he knew he was going to
be big but didn't quite anticipate how

for all my life and I know the ocean
